title: Explain this Riot, please.

embed.description: Please take a look at the ping in League of Legends, and then look at the speed test. Please tell me what's wrong with this picture.

body: So, um, why is this even happening? I don't even know if I should even be talking to you guys about it, because it doesn't seem like anybody else was lagging, but I had about 30 seconds of normal ping for the whole game.

replies.body:
Hey there,

The ping displayed on speedtest.net does not accurately reflect your ping in other applications as speedtest automatically chooses the best available server that is closest to you for their tests.

Is this issue still occurring? If so could you please do the following for me.

* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text and reply back with them here (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this)
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/) and post back with a link to your results here.
